summary.para: Contains default item captions displayed in the Report Designer's toolbar.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_rgArrange". Corresponds to the Arrange toolbar group that contains items allowing you to change the order of stacked elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bBackground". Corresponds to the toolbar item that specifies the background color of the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bBringForward". Corresponds to the toolbar item that moves the selected report elements one step closer to the front.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bBringToFront". Corresponds to the toolbar item that brings the selected report elements to the front of a group of stacked elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bBringToFrontSelector". Corresponds to the Bring to Front toolbar button that brings the selected report elements to the front.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bCopy". Corresponds to the Copy toolbar button that copies the selected report elements to the clipboard.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bCut". Corresponds to the Cut toolbar button that cuts the selected report elements to the clipboard.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bDelete". Corresponds to the Delete toolbar button that removes the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_rpDesigner". Corresponds to the Report Designer tab that activates the report's design mode.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_rgEdit". Corresponds to the Edit toolbar group that contains items for editing report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_rgEditors". Corresponds to the Editors toolbar group that contains buttons for invoking dedicated dialogs.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bFontBold". Corresponds to the toolbar item that applies/removes bold formatting to/from the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_rgFont". Corresponds to the Font toolbar groups that contains items for customizing font, color, formatting and alignment settings of report controls.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bFontItalic". Corresponds to the toolbar item that applies/removes italic formatting to/from the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bFontName". Corresponds to the toolbar item that specifies the font name of the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bFontSize". Corresponds to the toolbar item that specifies the font size of the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bFontStrikeOut". Corresponds to the toolbar item that applies/removes strikethrough to/from the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bFontUnderline". Corresponds to the toolbar item that applies/removes underlining to/from the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bForeground". Corresponds to the toolbar item that specifies the foreground color of the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bNew". Corresponds to the New toolbar button that creates a new report using the Report Wizard.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bOpen". Corresponds to the Open toolbar button that invokes the Open dialog for selecting the report to be loaded.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bPageSetup". Corresponds to the Page Setup toolbar button that invokes the Page Setup dialog.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bPaste". Corresponds to the Paste toolbar button that pastes the contents of the clipboard to the selected report band.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_rpPreview". Corresponds to the Print Preview tab that activates the report's preview mode.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bRedo". Corresponds to the Redo toolbar button that reverses the results of the last undo action.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_rgReport". Correspond to the Report toolbar group that contains buttons for saving and loading reports.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bSave". Corresponds to the Save toolbar button that saves the current report to the file.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bSaveAs". Corresponds to the Save As toolbar button that invokes the Save dialog allowing you to select a file for saving the report.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bScripts". Corresponds to the Scripts toolbar button that shows/hides the Script Editor.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bSendBackward". Corresponds to the toolbar item that moves the selected report elements one step toward the back.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bSendToBack". Corresponds to the toolbar item that sends the selected report elements to the back of a group of stacked elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bSendToBackSelector". Corresponds to the Send to Back toolbar button that sends the selected report elements toward the back.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignCenter". Corresponds to the toolbar item that horizontally aligns the text of the selected report elements at the center.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignJustify". Corresponds to the toolbar item that horizontally justifies the text of the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignLeft". Corresponds to the toolbar item that horizontally aligns the text of the selected report elements on the left.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignRight". Corresponds to the toolbar item that horizontally aligns the text of the selected report elements on the right.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bTextHorAlignSelector". Corresponds to toolbar items that specify the horizontal text alignment of the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignBottom". Corresponds to the toolbar item that vertically aligns the text of the selected report elements at the bottom.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignMiddle". Corresponds to the toolbar item that vertically aligns the text of the selected report elements in the middle.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bTextVertAlignSelector". Corresponds to toolbar items that specify the vertical text alignment of the selected report elements.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bTextAlignTop". Corresponds to the toolbar item that vertically aligns the text of the selected report elements at the top.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bUndo". Corresponds to the Undo toolbar button that cancels the last change made to the report.
Returns "xpf_reports_Ribbon_bWatermark". Corresponds to the Watermark toolbar button that invokes the Watermark dialog.
Provides data for the and events.

The class that provides basic functionality for the End-User Report Designer.
For internal use.

Occurs each time a report designer document has been opened.

Occurs every time an attempt to save a report displayed in a designer document fails.
